cells.data:
- you have your connection and you want to produce a 1 form on this space of frames
- what is a connection? it's a way of giving yourself horizontal vectors, so it amounts to say that (notation: total space $B$ of the vector bundle $E$ over manifold $X$ and space of frames is $B^\times$) we look at the SES (over $B$) $0\to\pi^*\Omega_X^1\to\Omega_B^1\to\pi^*E^*\to0$
- direct sum of wedge p + wedge q (for p+q = 3)
- take curvature of connection and pull back to $B^\times$
- $\operatorname{Hom}(E,E)\cong E\otimes E^*$
- $\mathcal{O}_{B^\times}\to\pi^*E\to Q$
